description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve compliance with industrial wastewater treatment regulations in four of the most industrialized provinces in Vietnam.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adoption of ESMF (Sch 2, Section I, D1) | Description :MPI adopting an Environmental and Social ManagementFramework. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Amendment of Safeguards Instruments (Sch 2, Section 1, D2) | Description :No amendments to the SafeguardInstruments without prior written agreement of IDA; maintaining policies and procedures to monitor and evaluate the implementationof the Safeguard Instruments. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :CETP Financial Operational Manual (Sch 2, Section I, B1) | Description :VEPF adopting a CETP FinancingOperational Manual (OM) setting forth guidelines and procedures for the implementation of Part 2 of the Project; amendments to theOM require prior written agreement of IDA. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Environmental Impact Assessement & Environmental Mgt Plan (Sch 2, Section I, B2) | Description :Respectivedeveloper preparing and implementing an Environmental Impact Assessment, including an Environmental Management Plan, in accordancewith the Environmental and Social Management Framework (ESMF) | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Focal Person in Provincial Peoples' Committee (Sch 2, Section I, A8) | Description :Appointing and maintaining afocal person within the relevant Provincial Peoples Committee by each Project Province. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Implementation of Environmental Code of Practice (Sch 2, Section I, D1) | Description :MONRE preparing andensuring the timely implementation of Environmental Codes of Practices, in accordance with the ESMF | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual (Sch 2, Section I, A9) | Description :MPI adopting a Project Implementation Manual(PIM) setting forth guidelines and procedures for the implementation of the Project; amendments to the PIM require prior writtenagreement of IDA. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit in MONRE (Sch 2, Section I, A4) | Description :Establishing and maintaining a ProjectManagement Unit within Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment (MONRE), provided with sufficient resources and staffed withcompetent personnel in adequate numbers. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit in MPI (Sch 2, Section I, A2) | Description :Establishing and maintaining a ProjectManagement Unit within Ministry of Planning and Investment (MPI), provided with sufficient resources and staffed with competentpersonnel in adequate numbers. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit in VEPF (Sch 2, Section I, A6) | Description :Establishing and maintaining a ProjectManagement Unit within Vietnam Environmental Protection Fund (VEPF), provided with sufficient resources and staffed with competentpersonnel in adequate numbers. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Steering Committee (Sch 2, Section I, A1) | Description :Establishing and maintaining a Project SteeringCommittee for general technical and policy guidance | Frequency :Yearly
